about_the_game:
Welcome to the dark and compelling world of "Shadow City Mysteries: A Clockwork Noir," where the lines between a simple mystery, a deep-rooted conspiracy, and a chilling supernatural thriller blur. Step into the shoes of a down-on-their-luck detective and navigate through the shadowy streets of a city that hides more than it reveals. Your wits, deductive skills, and choices will uncover a narrative that expands with each playthrough, revealing a world much larger and more intricate than you ever imagined.



Immerse yourself in a richly woven story that evolves with your every decision. Unravel the threads of a complex tapestry that combines elements of mystery, conspiracy, and supernatural events to reveal the true essence of Shadow City.



Dive deep into crime scenes, analyze clues, and engage in meaningful conversations with a diverse cast of characters. Your detective skills will be put to the test as you piece together the puzzles that lie at the heart of Shadow City.



Choose your detective's origin from six distinct backgrounds—Society of Ravens, Court of Rats, Iron Union Worker, Brass Consortium, Church of Astra, or Cult of Tenebrous. Each choice not only provides a unique starting point but also influences how you interact with the world and its inhabitants.



With our unique New Story+ feature, each playthrough unlocks new abilities and insights, allowing you to approach the mystery from different angles. Discover new facets of the story, explore previously inaccessible areas, and unveil secrets that were hidden in plain sight.

content_descriptors.notes: With a horror noir setting the game potentially has violence, sex, drugs, and other mature topics alluded to or on screen.
